attributes.action: posthumously honour or recognise Pink Floyd founder Syd Barrett's musical inspiration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pink Floyd founder Syd Barrett was highly influencial to many musicians, including David Bowie and Blur guitarist Graham Coxon. Barrett died in July 2006 but was only active as a musician during the late 60s and early 70s. He deserves to be posthumously honoured or recognised in some way by the government.
